Add a concise causal chain: Fed cut → lower term premium → 57 bp 2‑yr/10‑yr steepening → higher real‑yield differential → DXY up. Include the risk factors (Fed hike, Treasury debt spike, flattening spread) and the catalyst window (Sept Fed meeting, early‑Aug CPI, Aug 30 PCE, Aug 31 NFP). Ensure every claim has an inline citation (B1KYJ1GPU, XTQIQRP5K, NIT6JFIQF, FAN5RYW6T, LF0UUL917, Z7O1DCHS7, 7XH2DKEKV). Remove the mortgage‑rate sentence or reframe it to explicitly link to DXY (e.g., “a 30‑yr yield rise would compress the dollar’s real‑yield advantage”).
